Get RDB data model

Source: R/rdb.gen.R
dm.Rd

Get RDB data model

Usage

dm(
  connection = connect(user = "rdb_admin", password = pg_role_pw("rdb_admin")),
  incl_aux_admin_tbls = FALSE
)

Arguments

connection

Database connection to a PostgreSQL DBMS as returned by connect(). An S4 object that inherits from DBI::DBIConnection.

incl_aux_admin_tbls

Whether or not to include the auxiliary administrative unit tables supranational_entities, countries, subnational_entities, municipalities

Value

A data model object.

See also

Other administration functions: clean_attachment_bucket(), config_nocodb_tbl_cols(), config_nocodb_tbls(), connect(), create_nocodb_tbl_cols(), create_nocodb_tbls(), delete_rfrnds(), notify_postgrest(), purge_nocodb(), reset_nocodb(), reset_rdb(), restart_neon_ep(), restart_postgrest(), update_administrative_units(), update_countries(), update_langs(), update_municipalities(), update_rfrnds(), update_subnational_entities(), update_tbl(), update_topics()

Examples

rdb::dm() |> dm::dm_draw(view_type = "all")
